tweet: "Do what is right. Be pure. At the end of the way is freedom.  Till then patience."  Buddha
“We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.” Winston Churchill
"The truth will set you free. But first, it will piss you off." Gloria Steinem
“Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.” --Harriett Beecher Stowe
Ordinary people can live extraordinary lives when they follow their dreams.
